articles.title: What is behind Turkish President Erdogan's NATO U-turn? - DW (English)
articles.description: After a long and bitter process that lasted more than a year, Turkey's Recep Tayyip Erdogan agreed to back Stockholm's application to NATO. Why did he change his mind?
articles.content: Twice on the same day, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan managed to stun the West: First with an additional requirement for Sweden's NATO membership and then with a surprise last-minute compromi… [+6733 chars]

articles.title: NASA's James Webb discovers oldest supermassive black hole in distant galaxy - Daily Mail
articles.description: NASA's Webb telescope has detected the oldest supermassive black hole yet, which sits in a galaxy that formed just 570 million years after the Big Bang that occurred 13.8 million years ago.
articles.content:
NASA's James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) detected a 13.2-billion-year-old supermassive black that could change our understanding of the early universe.
